title: Your phone at a glance
answer:
![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111259)

 Introduce of the keys: 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111260)Return key：click it to return the last menu or exit the application 

 click it in the text input interface to close the Onscreen keyboard 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111261)Home screen button：click it to return main screen 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111262)menu：click it to open the menu of current interface 

 Long press it to open the application list used recently
